product_name: The North Face Gatebreak Down Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: The straightforward Gatebreak Down insulated jacket by The North Face features 550-fill goose down and water-resistant protection for your epic days of cold, dry powder skiing. Insulated with quality 550-fill-power down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. Water-resistant, breathable shell sheds light rain and snow. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out. Zip handwarmer pockets; zip wrist accessory pocket with goggles cloth; internal media pocket; internal goggles pocket. Insulated hood ensures a weather-blocking warmth around your head. Hem can be adjusted to block cold air while retaining valuable warmth. The North Face Gatebreak Down insulated jacket has a relaxed fit.
short_description: The straightforward Gatebreak Down insulated jacket by The North Face features 550-fill goose down and water-resistant protection for your epic days of cold, dry powder skiing.
